import React from 'react' import { useState,useEffect } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux' import { createCategory,getCategories,deleteCategory } from '../../../functions/category' import { toast } from 'react-toastify' import { DeleteOutlined ,EditOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons'; import { createProduct } from '../../../functions/product' import AdminNav from '../../../components/nav/AdminNav' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' const initialstate={ title:'', description:'', price:'', categories:[], category:'', subs:[], shipping:'', quantity:'', image:[], colors:['Black','Brown','Silver','White','Blue','Red'], color:'', brands:['Apple','Lenovo','ASUS','Dell','HP','Microsoft'], brand:'', } const CreateProduct=()=>{ const [values,setValues]=useState(initialstate) const handleClick=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } //destructure all the states so that we can use easily const {title,description,price,categories,category,subs,shipping,quantity,image,colors,brands,color,brand}=values const handleChange=(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() } return (

Create Product page

) } export default CreateProduct
